skins.selfIntroduction: Though Chiyoda and I were originally designed as seaplane tenders, during a certain war, we were remodeled into aircraft carriers. Whether it's due to my lack of skill or my inability to oppose the passing of time... I wasn't able to be of much use until the end.
skins.acquisition: I am Chitose, light carrier of the Sakura Empire. Commander, I look forward to receiving your guidance. By the way, is it true that Chiyoda is also here? ...Don't worry, I was merely inquiring.
skins.login: Oh, you're here. There's some red bean jelly from Chiyoda on your desk. Feel free to take some.
skins.details: Chiyoda and I are partners in carrying out shrine duties. Even though Chiyoda can be pretty annoying at times, there are still times she's fun to be around.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Isuzu... is quite a scaredy cat, but she's a good girl. But even that side of her is cute.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Chiyoda always insists on doing my hair this way, so I let her. However, I always feel a bit apologetic for making her do so much...
skins.secretaryIdle3: I'm at least confident in my Kagura dancing skills. If you get the chance, please come and watch.
skins.secretaryTouch: Who?! ... Oh, it's you. I thought it was a prank from that pink-haired Union girl.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: Do you like touching my bangs like Chiyoda does?

skins.shipDescription: An order of coconut milk... and grilled sausage. Mm, that should do it. ...Hm? Commander? Are you here to place an order, or to get away from the heat?
skins.acquisition: An order of coconut milk... and grilled sausage. Mm, that should do it. ...Hm? Commander? Are you here to place an order, or to get away from the heat?
skins.login: The sun's rays are so harsh... I should go look for some awning to hide under...
skins.details: Everyone becomes so rowdy when they get to the beach... I hope nothing bad happens today. Please, may enemy aircraft and volleyballs not come flying our way...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Isuzu, who told you that...? There aren't any ghosts here, don't worry. Go out and play.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Chiyoda's quite the sore loser... She's like that even when it comes to building sand castles, so I can't even imagine how worked up she'd get over beach volleyball... If that pink-haired union girl is our opponent, I think I'll just sit out...
skins.secretaryIdle3: The weather forecast says... it'll be clear until the evening... Mmn...
skins.secretaryTouch: That shaved ice looks really good... I guess there's a good reason cold treats are popular in the summer.
